original: astināstivyatikrāntā buddhir yeṣāṃ nirāśrayā /
analyzed: buddhiḥ yeṣām nirāśrayā

original: gambhīras tair nirālambaḥ pratyayārtho vibhāvyate // NagYsk_01 ...
analyzed: gambhīraḥ taiḥ nirālambaḥ pratyaya arthaḥ vibhāvyate

original: saṃsāraṃ caiva nirvāṇaṃ manyante 'tattvadarśinaḥ /
analyzed: saṃsāram ca eva nirvāṇam manyante tattva darśinaḥ

original: na saṃsāraṃ na nirvāṇaṃ manyante tattvadarśinaḥ // NagYsk_05
analyzed: na saṃsāram na nirvāṇam manyante tattva darśinaḥ

original: nirvāṇaṃ ca bhavaś caiva dvayam etan na vidyate /
analyzed: nirvāṇam ca bhavaḥ ca eva dvayam etat na vidyate

original: parajñānaṃ bhavasyaiva nirvāṇam iti kathyate // NagYsk_06 ...
analyzed: para jñānam bhavasya eva nirvāṇam iti kathyate

original: tat tat prāpya yad utpannaṃ notpannaṃ tat svabhāvataḥ /
analyzed: tat tat prāpya yat utpannam na utpannam tat svabhāvataḥ

original: svabhāvena yan notpannam utpannaṃ nāma tat katham // NagYsk_19 ...
analyzed: svabhāvena yat na utpannam utpannam nāma tat katham

original: sarvam astīti vaktavyam ādau tattvagaveṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: sarvam asti iti vaktavyam ādau tattva gaveṣiṇaḥ

original: paścād avagatārthasya niḥsaṅgasya viviktatā // NagYsk_30 ...
analyzed: paścāt avagata arthasya niḥsaṅgasya vivikta tā

original: mamety aham iti proktaṃ yathā kāryavaśāj jinaiḥ /
analyzed: mama iti aham iti proktam yathā kārya vaśāt jinaiḥ

original: tathā kāryavaśāt proktāḥ skandhāyatanadhātavaḥ // NagYsk_33
analyzed: tathā kārya vaśāt proktāḥ skandha āyatana dhātavaḥ

original: mahābhūtādi vijñāne proktaṃ samavarudhyate /
analyzed: mahābhūta ādi vijñāne proktam samavarudhyate

original: tajjñāne vagamaṃ yāti nanu mithyā vikalpitam // NagYsk_34 ...
analyzed: tad jñāne vagamam yāti nanu mithyā vikalpitam

original: hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yasya sthitir na pratyayair vinā /
analyzed: hetutaḥ saṃbhavaḥ yasya sthitiḥ na pratyayaiḥ vinā

original: vigamaḥ pratyayābhāvāt so 'stīty avagataḥ katham // NagYsk_39 ...
analyzed: vigamaḥ pratyaya abhāvāt saḥ sti iti avagataḥ katham

original: rāgadveṣodbhavas tīvraduṣṭadṛṣṭiparigrahaḥ /
vivādās tatsamutthāś ca bhāvābhyupagame sati // NagYsk_46
analyzed: vivādāḥ tad samutthāḥ ca bhāva abhyupagame sati

original: sa hetuḥ sarvadṛṣṭīnāṃ kleśotpattir na taṃ vinā /
analyzed: sa hetuḥ sarva dṛṣṭīnām kleśa utpattiḥ na tam vinā

original: tasmāt tasmin parijñāte dṛṣṭikleśaparikṣayaḥ // NagYsk_47
analyzed: tasmāt tasmin parijñāte dṛṣṭi kleśa parikṣayaḥ

original: parijñā tasya keneti pratītyotpādadarśanāt /
analyzed: parijñā tasya kena iti pratītya utpāda darśanāt

original: pratītya jātaṃ cājātam āha tattvavidāṃ varaḥ // NagYsk_48 ...
analyzed: pratītya jātam ca ajātam āha tattva vidām varaḥ

original: bālāḥ sajjanti rūpeṣu vairāgyaṃ yānti madhyamāḥ /
analyzed: bālāḥ sajjanti rūpeṣu vairāgyam yānti madhyamāḥ

original: svabhāvajñā vimucyante rūpasyottamabuddhayaḥ // NagYsk_55 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
analyzed: svabhāva jñāḥ vimucyante rūpasya uttama buddhayaḥ
